name: Base64 in C++
body:
### Base64 in C++

A basic Base64 encoder-decoder in C++.

Test cases require [googletest](http://code.google.com/p/googletest/ "googletest"), although there is some custom Scons scripts that build that in, so you won't be able to run the tests directly. You can use your own makefile/<other build process> to create a library for base64 and gtest and link them to the test binaries.

You can raise bugs on this project's [issue tracker](https://github.com/arunjitsingh/cc_base64/issues "Issues").
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
